mapper.update: update folder set fol_name = #{folName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fol_size = #{folSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fol_super_fol = #{folSuperFol,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fol_description = #{folDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fol_state = #{folState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fol_update_date = #{folUpdateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, fol_create_date = #{folCreateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, fol_emp_id = #{folEmp.empId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where fol_id = #{folId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT f.fol_id,f.fol_name,f.fol_size,f.fol_super_fol,e.emp_name FROM folder f LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON f.fol_emp_id=e.emp_id LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
